lines.speaker: narrator
lines.name: narrator
lines.text: When the bells fell silent across the plazas and the web of the world closed like a net, no one thought escape would be so absolute.

lines.speaker: narrator
lines.name: narrator
lines.text: Men and women woke to stone beneath them, sky-iron above, and a single rule: death here is final.

lines.speaker: nyrvessa
lines.name: nyrvessa
lines.text: You did not enter by your own handâ€”yet the law binds you. If your heart stops here, it will not beat elsewhere.

lines.speaker: player
lines.name: hero
lines.text: Trapped? Then the blade truly cuts. There'll be no second chance for me or those I swore to protect.

lines.speaker: nyrvessa
lines.name: nyrvessa
lines.text: Do not mistake courage for recklessness. One misstep and your tale seals shut.

lines.speaker: narrator
lines.name: narrator
lines.text: Above, families keep vigil over empty beds. Heroes who fall here do not return.

lines.speaker: player
lines.name: hero
lines.text: Then each breath I spend will carve a path. I won't be a name spoken only in regret.

lines.speaker: nyrvessa
lines.name: nyrvessa
lines.text: Maps lie. Allies fracture. Mercy costs coin you may not carry. Sharpen more than your steel.

lines.speaker: narrator
lines.name: narrator
lines.text: Beneath torchlight: bargains, oaths, and weighed souls. The dungeon keeps tally without pity.

lines.speaker: player
lines.name: hero
lines.text: If death is the final ledger, my lines will be written in deeds.

lines.speaker: nyrvessa
lines.name: nyrvessa
lines.text: Go, then. Carry this ember. When you face what took your kin, remember what you will spend to win.

lines.speaker: narrator
lines.name: narrator
lines.text: The gates seal. A thousand hearts bind to one law: survive, or be forgotten. Your story begins.
